ygData.subject: Re: Carnage
ygData.msgSnippet: Teltoli dodged a shower of dirt that Carnage suddenly kicked up, and she looked down at the base of the trunk where a hole was rapidly forming from the raptors

Teltoli dodged a shower of dirt that Carnage suddenly kicked up, and 
she looked down at the base of the trunk where a hole was rapidly 
forming from the raptors claws. She blinked rapidly, a look of 
confusion on her face.

"Uh.. what are you doing?" She asked carefully, peeking round her 
friends body to peer at the hole and the pigs that lay by her feet. 
Realization caught on. "Oh! You're burying the chow.. I get it" She 
grinned, and kept silent for a few seconds. But she never could keep 
silent for a long time, unless she was asleep or knocked out.

The Fuzor thought back to the way Carnage had reacted when she had 
tripped over the branch, and she winced. She opened her mouth 
slightly, as if to say something, but stopped and shut it again.

"I'm sorry for being such a kid.." She said, so sudden that it 
starteled even her. Where had that come from? "You must think I have 
the brain of a three year old" Teltoli snorted "Come to think of it, 
I probably do. You're getting sick of me, I can tell. Um.. all I'm 
saying is.."

She let out a heavy sigh. "Can you teach me how to fight? Like, 
properly? My dad taught me the basics.. but obviously you can handle 
yourself in a battle. I can't, I mean seeing the way that I ran away 
from the Alliance/Maximal fight.. I can't believe I did that.. but 
can you teach me?"

Her sentances had stumbled out in a rush, almost as if she had to say 
them before she would change her mind. She was a teenager, in an 
adults world, and she was struggling. Sure, she could fight, she knew 
basic tactics.. but basics didn't get you hardly anywhere in a war.

The Fuzor had never been in a war, short of the minature ones on 
Earth, so she could hardly say she had experiance. Her best tactic 
was undercover work, she excelled at that. Having a lithe and very 
flexible body, she was perfect for that kind of stuff. But hard war.. 
and injuries.. she couldn't handle.
